name: The Fox and the Rabbit in the Sun
name_original: The Fox and the Rabbit in the Sun
description:
How To Play: Use the arrow keys to move around the game box. Try to avoid the foxes they are your enemies. The blue berries are food when you eat them your score will go up by 5. Try to get the hearts they are lives when you eat them you get an extra life. The shield is a rainbow looking circle. The aim is to get as many blueberries as possible.

Made by: Alice Hardham
